Name: Apply Security Hardening guidelines
Description:
Applies the Security hardening guidelines as specified by Sitecore.

See 
https://doc.sitecore.net/sitecore_experience_platform/81/setting_up__maintaining/security_hardening

Parameters.Name: siteName
Parameters.Label: Site Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the site to apply the security hardening guides to.

Parameters.Name: mediaRequestSharedSecretGuid
Parameters.Label: Media Request Shared Secret
Parameters.HelpText: Guid value for the Sitecore Media.SharedSecret setting.

Parameters.Name: role
Parameters.Label: Role
Parameters.HelpText: The role the machine has. This parameter only affects CM machines in the sense that the phantom js is only excluded for them.

Parameters.Name: extraInclude
Parameters.Label: Extra Include Path
Parameters.HelpText: Path to a folder containing extra included Sitecore configuration files. The additional configuration files required by this security hardening step will be copied there. If you leave this empty, the path Website\App_Config\include\zz will be used.

Parameters.Name: dataFolderPath
Parameters.Label: Data Folder Path
Parameters.HelpText: The path to the data folder. If not specified the script will try to get it from App_Config\Include\DataFolder.config

Parameters.Name: stepsString
Parameters.Label: Steps String
Parameters.HelpText: This string specifies which steps will be applied. You specify the steps by nr on the string. Ex, for all steps you would give "123456789" as parameter. If you want to avoid step 1 then "23456789", etc.
